vscodeLocalLLMAgent.ollamaModel.description: Default model to use with Ollama

vscodeLocalLLMAgent.cacheResponses.description: Cache LLM responses to reduce API calls

localLLMAgent.cache.enabled.description: Enable or disable caching for LLM API requests

localLLMAgent.cache.ttlMinutes.description: Time-to-live for cached responses in minutes

copilot-ppa.workspaceAccess.enabled.description: Enable/disable workspace access for the AI agent

copilot-ppa.repository.enabled.description: Enable/disable repository access for the AI agent

copilot-ppa.gitlab.url.description: GitLab Instance URL (optional, defaults to gitlab.com)

copilotPPA.vectorDatabase.enabled.description: Enable vector database for semantic code search

copilotPPA.openaiApiKey.description: OpenAI API key for embeddings generation

messageSpacing.description: Spacing between chat messages in pixels

codeBlockTheme.description: Theme for code blocks in chat

userMessageColor.description: Color for user messages in chat

agentMessageColor.description: Color for agent messages in chat

compactMode.description: Use compact display for chat interface

copilot-ppa.theme.description: Theme settings for the Copilot PPA UI

localLlmAgent.terminal.defaultShellType.description: Default shell type to use for terminal operations

localLlmAgent.terminal.saveCommandHistor.description: Whether to save command history between sessions

localLlmAgent.terminal.maxHistorySize.description: Maximum number of command history entries to save

localLLMAgent.documentation.style.description: The style of documentation to generate (JSDoc or TSDoc).

localLLMAgent.documentation.includeExamp.description: Whether to include examples in the generated documentation.

localLLMAgent.documentation.includeTypes.description: Whether to include types in the generated documentation.

localLLMAgent.documentation.includeTypeP.description: Whether to include type parameters in the generated documentation.

localLLMAgent.documentation.api.includeJ.description: Include JavaScript files in API documentation generation.

localLLMAgent.documentation.api.includeT.description: Include TypeScript files in API documentation generation.

localLLMAgent.documentation.api.includeP.description: Include Python files in API documentation generation.

localLLMAgent.documentation.api.includeJ.description: Include Java files in API documentation generation.

localLLMAgent.documentation.api.includeC.description: Include C# files in API documentation generation.

localLLMAgent.documentation.api.includeG.description: Include Go files in API documentation generation.

localLLMAgent.documentation.api.outputFo.description: Default output format for API documentation.

localLLMAgent.documentation.readme.inclu.description: Whether to include badges in generated README files.
Whether to include a table of contents in generated README files.

localLLMAgent.documentation.wiki.locatio.description: Location to store generated Wiki files.

copilot-ppa.codeLinks.description: Store code links between related code segments

copilot-ppa.selectedProvider.description: Select the AI provider to use for code assistance (Local LLM or GitHub Copilot)

localLlmAgent.enableCopilotIntegration.description: Enable integration with GitHub Copilot Chat

localLLMAgent.performance.bottleneckDete.description: Enable automatic detection of performance bottlenecks

localLLMAgent.performance.maxCacheItems.description: Maximum number of items to keep in performance cache

localLLMAgent.performance.reportInterval.description: Interval in minutes between automatic performance reports (0 to disable)

copilot-ppa.debug.enableCommunicationAna.description: Enable tracking of Copilot communication for analysis and debugging

copilot-ppa.debug.maxHistorySize.description: Maximum number of communication records to keep in history

copilot-ppa.debug.autoOpenDashboard.description: Automatically open debug dashboard on startup

copilot-ppa.debug.enableGpuDetection.description: Enable GPU detection for performance optimization

copilot-ppa.logger.logFilePath.description: Path to log file (leave empty for default location)

copilot-ppa.logger.maxSize.description: Maximum size of log files in MB before rotation

copilot-ppa.logger.maxFiles.description: Maximum number of log files to keep

copilot-ppa.logger.maxInMemoryLogs.description: Maximum number of log entries to keep in memory

enumDescriptions: Use Ollama as the LLM provider
Use LM Studio as the LLM provider

localLLM.modelId.description: The ID of the LLM model to use

localLLM.contextAwareness.description: Enable context-aware responses based on conversation history

localLLM.persistProgrammingPreferences.description: Persist programming language preferences between sessions

localLLM.maxHistorySize.description: Maximum number of messages to keep in history

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
scripts.test:parallel:all: npm run test:parallel:unit && npm run test:parallel:integration
